comments_since_last_sample.body: Absolutely love the video, would greatly appreciate many more parts to this. Especially when you, as now, recommend more modern pieces - I couldn't imagine a better team to guide me into this field of classical music than twoset.
I really enjoyed this.  I would love more recommendation videos with these kinds of analysis and discussion.
Great list guys. Might I suggest Lili Boulanger Tres Morceaux as a highly underrated piano piece.

THAT WAS SO POGCHAMP
It was the most pleasant trip I've been on lately 😭
Definitely need more videos like that
Thank you twoset for recommending such great music. Prokofiev's 3rd piano concerto is definitely one of my favorite piano concertos.
1:46 I hear - "Welcome to the world of the pussy" . Me gasping in disbelief. And then couple of seconds later:  oohhh... Debussy !!
